name: Perform evaluation on a preconfigured inference unit without essential evaluation criteria

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for image classification with sub models
And an evaluation plan with no criteria for an image classification inference unit with sub models
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then a successful result indicating all criteria passed is computed
Then the precision metric is calculated to be 0.29
Then the recall metric is calculated to be 0.38
Then the f1 metric is calculated to be 0.29
Then the rocauc metric is calculated to be 0.54
Then the acc metric is calculated to be 0.4
Then for sub model genre-prediction, the precision metric for class name Adventure is calculated to be 0.6
Then for sub model genre-prediction, the recall metric for class name Comedy is calculated to be 0.62
Then for sub model genre-prediction, the f1 metric for class name Drama is calculated to be 0.51
Then for sub model genre-prediction, the rocauc metric for class name Romance is calculated to be 0.79
Then for sub model genre-prediction, the acc metric for class name Sci-Fi is calculated to be 0.86
Then for sub model brightness-prediction, the acc metric is calculated to be 0.36
Then for sub model brightness-prediction, the f1 metric is calculated to be 0.31
Then for sub model brightness-prediction, the precision metric is calculated to be 0.4
Then for sub model brightness-prediction, the recall metric is calculated to be 0.35
Then for sub model brightness-prediction, the rocauc metric is calculated to be 0.52

fullName: It must be possible to assess that an image classification inference unit with sub models behaves as intended: Perform evaluation on a preconfigured inference unit without essential evaluation criteria

labels.name: feature
labels.value: It must be possible to assess that an image classification inference unit with sub models behaves as intended
